data.oai_dc:dc: Diatom assemblage of sediment core GIK13404-1 from the Baltic Sea, Danziger Bucht

Achnanthes lanceolata, Actinocyclus octonarius, Amphora ovalis var. lybica, Amphora ovalis var. pediculus, Caloneis bacillum, Chaetoceros spores, Cocconeis diminuta, Cocconeis placentula, Cocconeis scutellum, Counting, diatoms, Cyclotella comta, Cyclotella meneghiniana, Cymatopleura elliptica, Cymbella sinuata fo. ovata, Danziger Bucht, DEPTH, sediment/rock, Diatoms, Diploneis didyma, Diploneis domblittensis, Diploneis interrupta, Diploneis litoralis, Diploneis ovalis, Diploneis smithii, Diploneis smithii var. rhombica, Diploneis stroemii, Epithemia argus var. alpestris, Epithemia hyndmanni, Epithemia intermedia, Epithemia muelleri, Epithemia sorex, Epithemia turgida, Epithemia zebra, Epithemia zebra var. porcellus, Fragilaria brevistriata, Fragilaria construens, Fragilaria construens var. binodis, Fragilaria construens var. subsalina, Fragilaria construens var. triundulata, Fragilaria construens var. venter, Fragilaria lapponica, Fragilaria leptostauron, Fragilaria pinnata, Fragilaria pinnata var. lancettula, GIK/IfG, GIK13404-1, GIK-cruise, Grammatophora oceanica, Gravity corer (Kiel type), Gyrosigma spenceri var. nodifera, Hyalodiscus scoticus, Institute for Geosciences, Christian Albrechts University, Kiel, Melosira arenaria, Melosira islandica, Melosira italica, Navicula anglica, Navicula platystoma, Navicula scutelloides, Nitzschia punctata, Opephora martyi, Rhabdonema minutum, Rhizosolenia c.-a./h. forma h.-group, Rhoicosphenia curvata, Rhopalodia gibba, Rhopalodia gibberula, SL, Stephanodiscus rotula, Stephanodiscus rotula var. minutula, Thalassionema nitzschioides, Thalassiosira oestrupii
